Row.Text: Hello and welcome to the seas of the Canton Pirates. I am Pirate Queen Ching Shih. I have crawled my my way from squalor to rule my mighty nation. What great deeds have you done?
My seas... red with blood. I vow to you that our spirits shall never be quenched. Beware! For Canton shall rise again.
I've been awaiting you. Perhaps we should continue this conversation in my chambers.
Good thing you're here. All of my attendees disappoint me with their ineptitude. Perhaps you can satisfy me
Do you want to peek at our latest shipment of booty? Its quite lovely, but not as much my personal stash.
Welcome back to Canton. Perhaps you would be interested in gambling the fate our nations.
Did you know that I used to work in a brothel? My nation today has many such delights. You should partake in the festivities.
We pirates are famous for our booty. Mine above all else.
My pirates are civilized, unlike your brutish people
Your nobles are not even fit to serve in our brothels. What do you want now?
Great. I just needed someone to disappoint me again today.
My sea raiders would love to pillage your cities. You interested?
If you claim land like we claim booty, we are going to have a problem
Our treasury is running quite low and the seas right now are not auspicious for piracy. Would you lend a hand? You will be generously repaid.
We have vast piles of loot and luxuries and I see that you do too. It is in our best benefit to share our booty, is it not?.
Care to roam our seas with me?
After sharing beds, you betray me so? I guess I have to teach you what we do to people like you.
You have made a grave mistake attacking my kingdom. Nowhere in the seven seas will you be able to hide from me and my wrath.
You have made a grave mistake attacking my kingdom. Nowhere in the seven seas will you be able to hide from me and my wrath.
